      • distanceKm

        public static double distanceKm(double lat1,
                double lon1,
                double lat2,
                double lon2)
        Computes the distance in kilometers between two points on Earth.
        Parameters:
        lat1 - Latitude of the first point
        lon1 - Longitude of the first point
        lat2 - Latitude of the second point
        lon2 - Longitude of the second point
        Returns:
        Distance between the two points in kilometers.

      • distanceKm

        Parameters:
        p1 - First point
        p2 - Second point
        Returns:
        Distance between the two points in kilometers.

      • bearing

        public static double bearing(GeoPoint p1,
             GeoPoint p2)
        Computes the bearing in degrees between two points on Earth.
        Parameters:
        p1 - First point
        p2 - Second point
        Returns:
        Bearing between the two points in degrees. A value of 0 means due north.

      • bearing

        public static double bearing(double lat1,

        Computes the bearing in degrees between two points on Earth.
        Parameters:
        lat1 - Latitude of the first point
        lon1 - Longitude of the first point
        lat2 - Latitude of the second point
        lon2 - Longitude of the second point
        Returns:
